name: barcode-generator
title: Barcode Generator
description: Create barcodes in various formats (Code128, EAN, UPC)
content:
Overview

This application generates barcodes in various standard formats. Built using python-barcode, it creates high-quality scannable barcodes suitable for retail, inventory management, and product labeling.

Features

  • Multiple barcode formats: Code128 (default), Code39, EAN13, EAN8, UPC-A
  • High-quality PNG output
  • Automatic checksum calculation for EAN/UPC
  • Industry-standard barcode generation

Parameters

  • Data: Enter the data to encode (numbers for EAN/UPC, alphanumeric for Code formats)
  • Output Directory: Select or create a stash folder for output

Output

The application generates a barcode image named barcode.png in the specified output directory.

Use Cases

  • Product labeling and packaging
  • Inventory management
  • Asset tracking
  • Retail point-of-sale systems
  • Shipping and logistics
command: rm -rf prod_apps || true; git clone https://github.com/CamberCloud-Inc/prod_apps.git && python $REPO_DIR/python/barcode_generator.py "${data}" -o "${outputDir}" -f code128
